728784f-a.text:
Dekay Street, south side, between Bard Ave. and North Mada Ave.
The view is eastward.
October 26, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
728784f-a.folder: Dekay Street & Bard Avenue, Staten Island, NY

728471f-a.text:
424 Bard Ave., at the N.W. corner of Dekay Street, showing the
Robinson home.
October 23, 1925.
P. L. Sperr.
728471f-a.folder: Bard Avenue & Dekay Street, Staten Island, NY
